title: Wazoun Dakouo Arrest Report & Body Cam Footage (Tucson Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am looking for the written arrest report, warrant for his arrest, the original complaint that was leveed against Wazoun Dakouo, as well as the body camera footage of the arresting officers that arrested Wazoun Dakouo on December 20th 2024 at approximately 5:00PM at a residence on the East Side of Tucson, located at 421 N Bonanza Ave, Tucson, AZ 85748 that is owned by the company I work for, The Tungland Corporation. Wazoun Dakouo's date of birth is July 21st 1981. The only information I have been able to find publicly about this arrest is that he is current located at the Pima County Adult Detention Center in Tucson, Arizona located on 1270 W. Silverlake Road Tucson, Arizona, his booking number is 241221009, and his case is going through the Superior Court of Pima County and his case number is CR20244999001.

Thank you!

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Adrian Alden Becerra
